mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id AS cartId, c.cust_id AS custId, c.product_id AS productId, c.product_qt AS productQt, c.cart_regdate AS cartRegdate, p.product_name AS productName, p.product_price AS productPrice, p.product_img AS productImg, p.discount_rate AS discountRate FROM cart c INNER JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.cart_id = #{cartId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cust_id, product_id, product_qt, cart_regdate) VALUES (#{custId}, #{productId}, #{productQt}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE product_qt = product_qt + VALUES(product_qt), cart_regdate = NOW()
